All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnyExpectations
Defines the available generic request (ANY) expectations.
BasicAuth
Helper utility for configuring BASIC request authentication.
BodyMatcher
Matcher for matching request body content.
BodyParamMatcher
Matcher used to match request body parameters (e.g.
ByteArrays
Utilities for working with arrays of bytes.
ChunkingConfig
Configuration for a chunked response.
ChunkingConfigImpl
Default implementation of the ChunkingConfig interface.
ClientRequest
An abstraction around the underlying HTTP server request that aids in matching and working with requests.
ContentType
A content-type representation.
Cookie
Ersatz abstraction of a request or response cookie.
CookieMatcher
Hamcrest matcher used to match Ersatz request cookie instances.
DecoderChain
A function chain for request decoders.
Decoders
Reusable request content decoder functions.
DecodingContext
Request-specific contextual information used by request content decoders.
DeleteExpectations
Defines the available DELETE request expectations.
EncoderChain
A function chain for response encoders.
Encoders
Reusable response content encoders.
ErsatzMatchers
Some reusable Hamcrest matchers useful in Ersatz expectations.
ErsatzMultipartResponseContent
Implementation of the multipart response content interface.
ErsatzRequest
Request implementation representing requests without body content.
ErsatzRequestRequirement
Implementation of a request requirement.
ErsatzRequestWithContent
Ersatz implementation of a Request with request body content.
ErsatzResponse
Implementation of the Response interface.
ErsatzServer
The main entry point for configuring an Ersatz server, which allows configuring of the expectations and management of the server itself.
ErsatzServerExtension
JUnit 5 Extension used to provide a simple means of managing an ErsatzServer instance during testing.
Expectations
The Expectations interface is the root element of the expectation configuration, which provides the ability to define request expectations and responses for test interactions.
ExpectationsImpl
Implementation of the Expectations interface.
GetExpectations
Defines the available GET request expectations.
HeaderMatcher
Matcher used to match a request header.
HeadExpectations
Defines the available HEAD request expectations.
HttpMethod
Enumeration of the supported HTTP request methods.
HttpMethodMatcher
A matcher used to match the HTTP method of a request.
MapKeyMatcher
Matcher for matching the existence of a key in a map.
MappedValuesMatcher
A matcher used to match a map with String keys mapped to a Deque of Strings.
MimeTypes
Helpers for working with MimeType objects.
MultipartPart
Representation of a multipart part for requests and responses.
MultipartRequestContent
Defines the request body content for a multipart request.
MultipartRequestMatcher
A Hamcrest matcher used to match MultipartRequestContent.
MultipartResponseContent
Response content object used to return a multipart response to a request.
OptionsExpectations
Defines the available OPTIONS request expectations.
PatchExpectations
Defines the available PATCH request expectations.
PathMatcher
Matcher used to match the request path.
PostExpectations
Defines the available POST request expectations.
PredicateMatcher<T>
Matcher used to match based on the result of a Predicate.
PutExpectations
Defines the available PUT request expectations.
QueryParamMatcher
Matcher used to match request query parameters.
Report
Defines a match-error report.
Request
Configuration interface for HTTP request expectations.
RequestCookieMatcher
Matcher used to match request cookie information.
RequestDecoders
Configuration manager for a collection of request content decoders.
RequestRequirement
Defines a global request requirement.
RequestSchemeMatcher
Matcher used to match the request scheme to determine whether it is secure (HTTPS) or not (HTTP).
RequestWithContent
Expectation configuration for a request with body content.
Requirements
Defines the available requirements configuration methods.
RequirementsImpl
Implementation of the Requirements interface used to perform the configuration of the request requirements.
Response
Used to configure the provided response to an HTTP request.
ResponseEncoders
Provides management of response encoders.
ServerConfig
Configuration interface for an Ersatz server instance.
ServerConfigImpl
Default implementation of the ServerConfig interface.
Timeout
A utility for operation timeout support.
UnderlyingServer
Defines the access points into the underlying HTTP server implementation.
UndertowUnderlyingServer
An UnderlyingServer implementation based on the Undertow server platform.
UnmatchedRequestReport
Helper object used to build and render a report of the unmatched request and the configured expectations.
